page.title: 14HOUSING IN BURNHAM MARKET 3
page.content:
{The Norfolk Structure Plan}
Burnham Market has been designated for major estate development and there is considerable concern here that such development will ruin the village. There is no likelihood of further council housing being built; all new houses will be private developments and are likely to be sold to people moving into the area to retire. The Norfolk Structure Plan is being revised in 1985 to cover the period to 1996. Proposals are being made to Norfolk County Council that, whilst limited development in this outstandingly beautiful village is desirable, Burnham Market should not be designated for major estate development. Whether the village retains its character and beauty may depend on this - time will tell.
